c74object.name: fl.wrap~
c74object.digest: Wraps the incoming frame into the range delimited by the low and high parameters..
c74object.description: Calculation is performed on triplets of values in turn. The output is a frame at least as long as the left most frame.When frames mismatch in size the result depends on the setting of the mismatch parameter.

entry.name: 0. /mismatch [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the mode used when dealing with mismatched input lengths: wrap - smaller right inputs are read modulo against larger left input. shrink - the output length is set to the size of the smaller input. extend - smaller right inputs are extended by repeating their final value
[0] - wrap [1] - shrink [2] - extend
